definition: A significant historical event involving a celestial body, specifically the act of a human-made vehicle landing on the surface of this celestial body. It is commonly referred to when discussing a specific event that occurred in the 20th century.

examples.german: Die erste Mondlandung fand am 20. Juli 1969 statt.
examples.english: The first moon landing took place on July 20, 1969.

examples.german: Neil Armstrong war der erste Mensch, der den Mond betrat.
examples.english: Neil Armstrong was the first person to set foot on the moon.

examples.german: Die Mondlandung war ein Meilenstein in der Geschichte der Raumfahrt.
examples.english: The moon landing was a milestone in the history of space exploration.

examples.german: Die Astronauten der Apollo 11 Mission kehrten sicher von der Mondlandung zur√ºck.
examples.english: The astronauts of the Apollo 11 mission returned safely from the moon landing.

examples.german: Die Mondlandung inspirierte viele Menschen auf der ganzen Welt.
examples.english: The moon landing inspired many people around the world.
